body: Yeah it okay for Chifuyu bear Ichika child since they (Chifuyu, Ichika, Madoka) is insemination baby that Made in laboratorium for the sake a artificial superior human and they got throw away (iirc, if doesn't then they run away) fter IS got founded By Tabane Chifuyu Instantly agree for being the 1st trial pilot to To support Her only family so that's why Ichika can ride IS also cuz His genetic is same as Chifuyu
Loplop I don't see what your talking about. Anyways I love Chifuyu Orimura she is sexy in my opioion. I would breed her all night long.

Otone has always been known for Onee-Chan incest stories & very detailed drawings. I'm surprised that more of them has not been translated. I think that the only person that could do a better Chifuyu-nee doujin than Otone would be Katsurai Yoshiaki (look at the Kokoro-nee in Koku Haku Lovers and tell me that's not Chifuyu-nee).
